title: How do I choose this content?
excerpt: Use Select to choose the content. Next, you enter information about the and to
content:
Use Select to choose the content. Next, you enter information about the content and add the content to your course.

Important:Â Check the title, table of contents, or other information to make sure the content is correct before selecting it. To look for different content, enter search terms in the box at the top of the page.
